data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Rondônia that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rondônia, Brazil
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 389,176 believers in Rondônia to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 389,176 believers in Rondônia, Brazil to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Rondônia, Brazil.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Ajuru people.
Spirit, guide seekers in Rondônia, Brazil to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Rondônia, Brazil to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Rondônia, Brazil that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.
